text: Yonny Hernández Vega (born 25 July 1988) is a Colombian motorcycle racer.Profile on motogp.com He is the older brother of Santiago Hernández. ==Career statistics== ===Grand Prix motorcycle racing=== ====By season==== {|class="wikitable" style=text-align:right !Season !Class !Motorcycle !Team !Race !Win !Podium !Pole !FLap !Pts !Plcd |- ! | Moto2 | BQR-Moto2 | Blusens–STX | 17 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 32 | 21st |- ! | Moto2 | FTR | Blusens–STX | 14 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 1 | 43 | 19th |- !rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| MotoGP | BQR-FTR |rowspan=2| Avintia Blusens |rowspan=2| 15 |rowspan=2| 0 |rowspan=2| 0 |rowspan=2| 0 |rowspan=2| 0 |rowspan=2| 28 |rowspan=2| 17th |- | BQR |- !rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| MotoGP | ART | Paul Bird Motorsport |rowspan=2| 18 |rowspan=2| 0 |rowspan=2| 0 |rowspan=2| 0 |rowspan=2| 0 |rowspan=2| 21 |rowspan=2| 18th |- | Ducati | Ignite Pramac Racing |- ! 2014 | MotoGP | Ducati | Energy T.I.
